ThingDef.label: Death Korps Helmet
ThingDef.description:
The characteristic gas mask of a member of the Death Korps of Krieg. Protects well against dangerous gas and toxic fallout. 

To sustain their grueling attrition rates, the Death Korps use a method known as “Vitae-Womb” - a system for mass-manufacture of human beings. Genetic samples are taken from the people of Krieg, used to create artificial sperm and egg cells, and are randomly paired together to rapidly produce humans. 

This system continues in the stranded fleet, with a voidship repurposed to contain Vitae-Womb equipment. As well as the Kriegsmen, samples are also taken from other Imperial volunteers, as well as suitable rimworlders - this increases the genetic diversity of the Death Korps.

ThingDef.label: Death Korps grenadier gas mask
ThingDef.description: The gas mask of a Death Korps Grenadier, an elite shock trooper of Krieg. It is slightly reinforced to provide a little better protection against shrapnel, with the reinforcement in the shape of a skull. \n\nIf the Kriegsmen were not fanatics, they would be disheartened by a lack of serious siege warfare on this rimworld - their speciality is little needed any more. But fanatics they are, and they soldier on without complaint.

ThingDef.label: Commissar cap
ThingDef.description: The black peaked cap of an Imperial Commissar. It is such a symbol of their status that Orks like to take them as battlefield trophies. \n\nThe Commissars in the Astra Militarum remnant are hard-pressed to keep order. The Guardsmen are spending too much time in contact with the local population for the Commissariat's liking, hearing too much about heretic and apostate ideoligions. Such insidious ideas as “democracy” and “freedom” must not take root in the Guard, lest disorder sweep through the ranks.
